meanings.definition: In a way that cannot be defeated or surpassed.
meanings.sent1: She ran unbeatably fast in the race.
meanings.sent2: He sings unbeatably well in the choir.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel unbeatably outsmarted the cat in the chase.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was unbeatably strong, like a fortress.
meanings.sent5: The sun shone unbeatably bright in the clear sky.

meanings.definition: To an extent that cannot be matched or outdone.
meanings.sent1: They unbeatably completed the puzzle in record time.
meanings.sent2: The team unbeatably won every game this season.
meanings.sent3: The chef unbeatably cooked the most delicious meal of the night.
meanings.sent4: His skills in painting were unbeatably artistic, like a master.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden bloomed unbeatably beautifully in the spring.
